channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 2023年的市场：飙升的股票和飙升的债券无视怀疑者
item.description: This year might go down as one of the most unusual ever in financial markets - mainly because everything seems to have come good despite a lot of turbulence and many predictions turning out to be wrong.翻译:今年可能会成为金融市场有史以来最不寻常的一年——主要是因为尽管经历了很多动荡并且许多预测被证明是错误的，但一切似乎都进展顺利。
item.author: Marc Jones

item.title: 美国监管机构对哆啦A梦玩具磁铁造成七人死亡后发出警报
item.description: The U.S. consumer protection authority on Thursday warned people to immediately stop using Chinese seller Doraemon's magnetic ball sets, after its loose, hazardous magnets resulted in seven deaths from ingestion.翻译:美国消费者保护机构周四警告人们立即停止使用中国卖家哆啦A梦的磁力球套装，此前该产品松动的危险磁铁导致七人因误食而死亡。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 团结一致的中国回族哀悼在地震中丧生的女孩
item.description: The Hui ethnic community of Yangwa village in China's earthquake-stricken northwest were on Thursday mourning the loss of eight-year-old Ma Jinyuan under the rubble of a wall that collapsed as she was sleeping in her home.翻译:周四，中国西北地震灾区杨洼村的回族社区正在哀悼八岁的马金媛，她在家中睡觉时，墙体倒塌，她在墙体废墟下丧生。
item.author: Alessandro Diviggiano

item.title: 美国启动半导体供应链审查以促进国家安全
item.description: The U.S. Department of Commerce said Thursday it will launch a survey of the U.S. semiconductor supply chain and national defense industrial base to address national security concerns from Chinese-sourced chips.翻译:美国商务部周四表示，将对美国半导体供应链和国防工业基础展开调查，以解决来自中国芯片的国家安全担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中美高级军事官员一年多来首次讲话
item.description: The top U.S. military officer held a virtual meeting with his Chinese counterpart on Thursday, the Pentagon said, in the first such conversation in over a year amid hopes by U.S. officials that it could lead to a broader restoration of ties between the militaries.翻译:五角大楼表示，美国高级军官周四与中国国防部长举行了一次虚拟会议，这是一年多来的首次此类对话，美国官员希望这可能会导致两国军队之间关系的更广泛恢复。
item.author: Phil Stewart, Doina Chiacu

item.title: 捷克亿万富翁蒂卡奇从中信收购布拉格斯拉维亚足球俱乐部
item.description: Czech billionaire Pavel Tykac will buy top-flight domestic soccer club Slavia Prague from Chinese investment group CITIC, he and the team said on Thursday.翻译:捷克亿万富翁帕维尔·蒂卡奇和他的团队周四表示，他将从中国投资集团中信集团手中收购国内顶级足球俱乐部布拉格斯拉维亚队。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 解说：中菲关系还能恶化到什么程度？
item.description: China and the Philippines have ramped up rhetoric on defending territorial claims in the South China Sea, despite both calling for dialogue to settle tensions over that strategic waterway.翻译:尽管中国和菲律宾都呼吁通过对话解决该战略航道的紧张局势，但双方都加大了捍卫南海领土主权的言论。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Morning Bid：这是为了圣诞节欢呼吗？
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Alun John.翻译:Alun John 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国以国家安全为由禁止出口稀土加工技术
item.description: China, the world's top processor of rare earths, on Thursday banned the export of technology to extract and separate the strategic metals, in a further step towards protecting its dominance in several strategic metals.翻译:作为全球最大的稀土加工国，中国周四禁止出口提取和分离战略金属的技术，进一步保护其在几种战略金属中的主导地位。
item.author: Siyi Liu, Dominique Patton

item.title: 缅甸军政府因应对叛军进攻而被指控犯有战争罪
item.description: Myanmar's military has likely perpetrated indiscriminate attacks on civilians and used banned cluster munitions in its fight against ethnic minority insurgents, Amnesty International said on Thursday, calling for an investigation of suspected war crimes.翻译:国际特赦组织周四表示，缅甸军方在打击少数民族叛乱分子的过程中可能对平民进行了不分青红皂白的袭击，并使用了违禁的集束弹药，并呼吁对涉嫌战争罪进行调查。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 惠誉将万达商业评级下调至“限制性违约”，随后升级至“CC”
item.description: Fitch Ratings downgraded Dalian Wanda Commercial Management Group to "restricted default (RD)" from "C" on completion of the distressed debt exchange, and simultaneously upgraded the firm to "CC" from "RD" to reflect its post-restructuring profile.翻译:不良债务置换完成后，惠誉评级将大连万达商业管理集团的评级从“C”下调至“限制性违约(RD)”，同时将该公司从“RD”升级至“CC”，以反映其重组后的状况。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中菲关系：南海争端重大事件
item.description: Relations between Manila and Beijing have soured under Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr, with Manila pivoting back towards the United States which supports the Southeast Asian nation in its maritime disputes with China.翻译:在菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯的领导下，马尼拉和北京之间的关系恶化，马尼拉转向支持菲律宾与中国的海上争端的美国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 在具有里程碑意义的安全案件中，香港维权律师被拒绝保释
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Thursday rejected a fresh bail application for pro-democracy activist and lawyer Chow Hang-tung, whose subversion trial under a China-imposed national security law is expected to open in late 2024.翻译:香港一家法院周四驳回了亲民主活动人士兼律师周恒东的新保释申请，根据中国实施的国家安全法，周恒东的颠覆罪审判预计将于 2024 年底开始。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam

item.title: 中国煤矿事故已造成12人死亡
item.description: An accident at a coal mine in China's northeastern province of Heilongjiang has killed 12, state broadcaster CCTV said on Thursday.翻译:据中央电视台周四报道，中国东北省份黑龙江省一处煤矿发生事故，已造成 12 人死亡。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国警告菲律宾不要在南海问题上“误算”
item.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi warned the Philippines that any miscalculation in their escalating dispute in the South China Sea would bring a resolute response, and urged dialogue to address "serious difficulties" between the two neighbours.翻译:中国外交部长王毅警告菲律宾，南海争端升级中的任何误判都将招致坚决回应，并敦促通过对话解决两个邻国之间的“严重困难”。
item.author: Liz Lee, Karen Lema

item.title: 台湾指责中国在取消关税后实施经济胁迫
item.description: Taiwan on Thursday accused China of economic coercion and election interference after Beijing announced the end of tariff cuts on some chemical imports from the island, saying Taipei violated a trade agreement, just ahead of Taiwanese elections.翻译:台湾周四指责中国经济胁迫和选举干涉，此前北京宣布结束对台湾部分化学品进口的关税削减，并称台北违反了一项贸易协议，就在台湾大选之前。
item.author: Ben Blanchard, Liz Lee

item.title: 中国地震后仍有12人失踪，137人死亡
item.description: A dozen people were still missing on Thursday after a 6.2-magnitude earthquake struck northwestern Gansu province late Monday, and netizens questioned the speed at which rescue operations had ended.翻译:周一晚间甘肃省西北部发生6.2级地震，周四仍有十几人失踪，网友质疑救援行动结束的速度。
item.author: Alessandro Diviggiano, Xiaoyu Yin, Liz Lee

item.title: 华尔街动荡后股票陷入困境，债券继续上涨
item.description: Share markets had an end of year wobble on Thursday, while bonds completed a remarkable round trip for the year on the consensus view that large parts of the world will be chopping interest rates in 2024.翻译:周四股市出现年底波动，而债券市场则完成了今年引人注目的往返，因为市场普遍认为世界大部分地区将在 2024 年降息。
item.author: Marc Jones

item.title: 中国将妈祖“和平女神”宗教作为台湾选举的武器
item.description: The Chinese Communist Party (CCP) is ramping up exchanges with folk religious groups in rural Taiwan in an attempt to manipulate political opinion in Beijing's favour ahead of elections next month, according to Taiwan government documents and security officials.翻译:台湾政府文件和安全官员称，中国共产党正在加强与台湾农村民间宗教团体的交流，试图在下个月的选举前操纵政治舆论，使之有利于北京。
item.author: James Pomfret, Yimou Lee

item.title: 限制锗和镓出口后，中国稀土主导地位成为焦点
item.description: China on Thursday banned the export of technology to extract and separate rare earths, in a further step towards protecting its dominance in several strategic metals.翻译:中国周四禁止出口稀土提取和分离技术，进一步保护其在几种战略金属中的主导地位。
item.author: Mai Nguyen, Eric Onstad
